channel.title: I need help everytime someone declines in trade they DC how do i fix this?
channel.description: Every time someone declines in trade they DC how do i fix this???? :confused:

item.title: I need help everytime someone declines in trade they DC how do i fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

U could always not leech pwnscape XD. No thats not gonna work the entire pwnscape decline trade method is fucked up really bad also you will soon start to notice that chars files will go blank that is a again a random side effect of pwnscape. But if you really want to fix this my advice is download my server noobscape which is on a pwnscape base and i fixed the decline trade thing just copy and paste the entire decline trade bit and u should be set

Read full topic

item.title: I need help everytime someone declines in trade they DC how do i fix this?
item.dc:creator: @i_pked_ya i pked ya
item.description:
@i_pked_ya wrote:

[quote=“ar-temi-s, post:2, topic:283207”][quote author=i pked ya link=topic=374240.msg2822226#msg2822226 date=1244684298]
Every time someone declines in trade they DC how do i fix this???
[/quote]

umm, in your trade code, look for the Decline Trade method, and you should see somthing along the lines of

Disconnect = true;

somewhere in it.[/quote]

OK what do i do after i find it?!?!?!?

Read full topic
